Thomas Kaldahl

Hi! I'm Thomas Kaldahl.
I am an incoming Mathematics PhD student at the University of Arizona.
I earned my BSc. in Math at Rice University.

This website is intended as a showcase for my personal works and
explorations (though it's a bit out of date!).
Feel free to browse around using the menu on top.

View my GitHub.

View my résumé.

Download my PGP key.
